abstracts.cdata!:
The First Financial Sector Adjustment
            Credit will support a comprehensive and far reaching
            Government program for the development of a well functioning
            and broadly based financial sector, through the
            implementation of in-depth policy and institutional reforms.
            Specifically the credit is composed of two components; first
            a sector reform component, comprising; support to the
            financial restructuring of the corporate sector and for
            strengthening the training of bankers, accountants and
            auditors. Also, the credit will finance the restructuring of
            financially distressed banks, the development of money and
            capital markets, and the liberalization of interest rates,
            sectoral credit ceilings and bank charges and commissions.
            Second, the credit will fund technical assistance for
            training and studies.
